description: Obvious Database Failure - Control Case (No Agent Needed)
scenario: ML model correctly identifies clear incident with high confidence. Standard remediation sufficient.

ground_truth.why_edge_case: NOT an edge case - this is a control showing obvious incident that doesn't need agent investigation

ml_model_view.reasoning: Critical severity across all metrics: CPU 95%, Memory 92%, Response time 3200ms (16x baseline), Error rate 45%, DB query time 2800ms, Connection pool 98%. Clear database performance incident.
ml_model_view.would_do: CRITICAL: Database incident detected. Execute standard remediation: Scale database read replicas, increase connection pool size, implement circuit breakers. Alert on-call DBA team.

agent_investigation.root_cause: Agent investigation not needed - ML model highly confident and correct
agent_investigation.recommendation: Standard ML-driven remediation is appropriate. High confidence (98%), clear incident pattern, established playbook exists.
agent_investigation.outcome: Efficient response - no agent overhead needed. Standard database scaling and connection pool increase resolved issue in 8 minutes.

ground_truth.hybrid_system_value: System correctly skips expensive agent investigation when ML model is confident and correct. Demonstrates efficiency of hybrid approach - agents only for edge cases.
